019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
023import freemarker.template.AdapterTemplateModel;
024import freemarker.template.Configuration;
025import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
026import freemarker.template.SimpleNumber;
027import freemarker.template.SimpleScalar;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
030import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
031import freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx;
032import freemarker.template.TemplateModel;
033import freemarker.template.TemplateModelException;
034import freemarker.template.utility.DeepUnwrap;
035import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
036import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
037import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
038import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
039import java.io.IOException;
040import java.math.BigDecimal;
041import java.math.BigInteger;
042import java.net.URI;
043import java.net.URISyntaxException;
044import java.util.HashMap;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Map;
047import java.util.Optional;
048import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
049import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Convertions;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver;
052import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
053import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinition;
054import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
055import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ResetVm;
056import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
057import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
058import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
059import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
060import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
061import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
062import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
063
064/**
065 * Adapts Kubenetes resources for instances of the Runner 
066 * application (the VMs) to changes in VM definitions (the CRs). 
067 * 
068 * In particular, the reconciler generates and updates:  
069 * 
070 * * A [`PVC`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/)
071 *   for storage used by all VMs as a common repository for CDROM images.
072 * 
073 * * A [`ConfigMap`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/configmap/)
074 *   that defines the configuration file for the runner.
075 *
076 * * A [`PVC`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/)
077 *   for 1 MiB of persistent storage used by the Runner (referred to as the
078 *   "runnerDataPvc")
079 *   
080 * * The PVCs for the VM's disks.
081 *
082 * * A [`Pod`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/) with the
083 *   runner instance[^oldSts].
084 *
085 * * (Optional) A load balancer
086 *   [`Service`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/access-application-cluster/create-external-load-balancer/)
087 *   that allows the user to access a VM's console without knowing which
088 *   node it runs on.
089 * 
090 * [^oldSts]: Before version 3.4, the operator created a
091 *    [`StatefulSet`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/statefulset/)
092 *    that created the pod.
093 * 
094 * The reconciler is part of the {@link Controller} component. It's 
095 * configuration properties are therefore defined in
096 * ```yaml
097 * "/Manager":
098 *   "/Controller":
099 *     "/Reconciler":
100 *       ...
101 * ```
102 *   
103 * The reconciler supports the following configuration properties:
104 * 
105 * * `runnerDataPvc.storageClassName`: The storage class name
106 *   to be used for the "runnerDataPvc" (the small volume used
107 *   by the runner for information such as the EFI variables). By
108 *   default, no `storageClassName` is generated, which causes
109 *   Kubernetes to use storage from the default storage class.
110 *   Define this if you want to use a specific storage class.
111 *
112 * * `cpuOvercommit`: The amount by which the current cpu count
113 *   from the VM definition is divided when generating the 
114 *   [`resources`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#resources)
115 *   properties for the VM (defaults to 2).
116 * 
117 * * `ramOvercommit`: The amount by which the current ram size
118 *   from the VM definition is divided when generating the
119 *   [`resources`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#resources)
120 *   properties for the VM (defaults to 1.25).
121 *   
122 * * `loadBalancerService`: If defined, causes a load balancer service 
123 *   to be created. This property may be a boolean or
124 *   YAML that defines additional labels or annotations to be merged
125 *   into the service defintion. Here's an example for using
126 *   [MetalLb](https://metallb.universe.tf/) as "internal load balancer":
127 *   ```yaml 
128 *   loadBalancerService:
129 *     annotations:
130 *       metallb.universe.tf/loadBalancerIPs: 192.168.168.1
131 *       metallb.universe.tf/ip-allocated-from-pool: single-common
132 *       metallb.universe.tf/allow-shared-ip: single-common
133 *   ```
134 *   This makes all VM consoles available at IP address 192.168.168.1
135 *   with the port numbers from the VM definitions.
136 *   
137 * * `loggingProperties`: If defined, specifies the default logging
138 *   properties to be used by the runners managed by the controller.
139 *   This property is a string that holds the content of
140 *   a logging.properties file.
141 */
142@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
143    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
144public class Reconciler extends Component {
145
146    /** The Constant mapper. */
147    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
148    protected static final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
149
150    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SingularField")
151    private final Configuration fmConfig;
152    private final ConfigMapReconciler cmReconciler;
153    private final DisplaySecretReconciler dsReconciler;
154    private final StatefulSetReconciler stsReconciler;
155    private final PvcReconciler pvcReconciler;
156    private final PodReconciler podReconciler;
157    private final LoadBalancerReconciler lbReconciler;
158    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
159    private final Map<String, Object> config = new HashMap<>();
160
161    /**
162     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
163     *
164     * @param componentChannel the component channel
165     */
166    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
167        super(componentChannel);
168
169        // Configure freemarker library
170        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
171        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
172        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
173            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
174        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
175            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
176        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
177        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
178
179        cmReconciler = new ConfigMapReconciler(fmConfig);
180        dsReconciler = new DisplaySecretReconciler();
181        stsReconciler = new StatefulSetReconciler(fmConfig);
182        pvcReconciler = new PvcReconciler(fmConfig);
183        podReconciler = new PodReconciler(fmConfig);
184        lbReconciler = new LoadBalancerReconciler(fmConfig);
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Configures the component.
189     *
190     * @param event the event
191     */
192    @Handler
193    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
194        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(c -> {
195            config.putAll(c);
196        });
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * Handles the change event.
201     *
202     * @param event the event
203     * @param channel the channel
204     * @throws ApiException the api exception
205     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
206     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
207     */
208    @Handler
209    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
210    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
211            throws ApiException, TemplateException, IOException {
212        // We're only interested in "spec" changes.
213        if (!event.specChanged()) {
214            return;
215        }
216
217        // Ownership relationships takes care of deletions
218        if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
219            logger.fine(
220                () -> "VM \"" + event.vmDefinition().name() + "\" deleted");
221            return;
222        }
223
224        // Create model for processing templates
225        Map<String, Object> model
226            = prepareModel(channel.client(), event.vmDefinition());
227        var configMap = cmReconciler.reconcile(model, channel);
228        model.put("cm", configMap);
229        dsReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
230        // Manage (eventual) removal of stateful set.
231        stsReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
232        pvcReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
233        podReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
234        lbReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * Reset the VM by incrementing the reset count and doing a 
239     * partial reconcile (configmap only).
240     *
241     * @param event the event
242     * @param channel the channel
243     * @throws IOException 
244     * @throws ApiException 
245     * @throws TemplateException 
246     */
247    @Handler
248    public void onResetVm(ResetVm event, VmChannel channel)
249            throws ApiException, IOException, TemplateException {
250        var vmDef = channel.vmDefinition();
251        vmDef.extra("resetCount", vmDef.<Long> extra("resetCount") + 1);
252        Map<String, Object> model
253            = prepareModel(channel.client(), channel.vmDefinition());
254        cmReconciler.reconcile(model, channel);
255    }
256
257    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", "PMD.NPathComplexity" })
258    private Map<String, Object> prepareModel(K8sClient client,
259            VmDefinition vmDef) throws TemplateModelException, ApiException {
260        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
261        Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
262        model.put("managerVersion",
263            Optional.ofNullable(Reconciler.class.getPackage()
264                .getImplementationVersion()).orElse("(Unknown)"));
265        model.put("cr", vmDef);
266        model.put("constants",
267            (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
268                Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
269                    .build().getStaticModels()
270                    .get(Constants.class.getName()));
271        model.put("reconciler", config);
272
273        // Check if we have a display secret
274        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
275        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
276            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
277            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + vmDef.name());
278        var dsStub = K8sV1SecretStub
279            .list(client, vmDef.namespace(), options)
280            .stream()
281            .findFirst();
282        if (dsStub.isPresent()) {
283            dsStub.get().model().ifPresent(m -> {
284                model.put("displaySecret", m.getMetadata().getName());
285            });
286        }
287
288        // Methods
289        model.put("parseQuantity", parseQuantityModel);
290        model.put("formatMemory", formatMemoryModel);
291        model.put("imageLocation", imgageLocationModel);
292        model.put("adjustCloudInitMeta", adjustCloudInitMetaModel);
293        model.put("toJson", toJsonModel);
294        return model;
295    }
296
297    private final TemplateMethodModelEx parseQuantityModel
298        = new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
299            @Override
300            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
301            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
302                    throws TemplateModelException {
303                var arg = arguments.get(0);
304                if (arg instanceof SimpleNumber number) {
305                    return number.getAsNumber();
306                }
307                try {
308                    return Quantity.fromString(arg.toString()).getNumber();
309                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
310                    throw new TemplateModelException("Cannot parse memory "
311                        + "specified as \"" + arg + "\": " + e.getMessage());
312                }
313            }
314        };
315
316    private final TemplateMethodModelEx formatMemoryModel
317        = new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
318            @Override
319            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
320            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
321                    throws TemplateModelException {
322                var arg = arguments.get(0);
323                if (arg instanceof SimpleNumber number) {
324                    arg = number.getAsNumber();
325                }
326                BigInteger bigInt;
327                if (arg instanceof BigInteger value) {
328                    bigInt = value;
329                } else if (arg instanceof BigDecimal dec) {
330                    try {
331                        bigInt = dec.toBigIntegerExact();
332                    } catch (ArithmeticException e) {
333                        return arg;
334                    }
335                } else if (arg instanceof Integer value) {
336                    bigInt = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
337                } else if (arg instanceof Long value) {
338                    bigInt = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
339                } else {
340                    return arg;
341                }
342                return Convertions.formatMemory(bigInt);
343            }
344        };
345
346    private final TemplateMethodModelEx imgageLocationModel
347        = new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
348            @Override
349            @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.PreserveStackTrace",
350                "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition" })
351            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
352                    throws TemplateModelException {
353                var image = ((SimpleScalar) arguments.get(0)).getAsString();
354                if (image.isEmpty()) {
355                    return "";
356                }
357                try {
358                    var imageUri
359                        = new URI("file://" + Constants.IMAGE_REPO_PATH + "/")
360                            .resolve(image);
361                    if ("file".equals(imageUri.getScheme())) {
362                        return imageUri.getPath();
363                    }
364                    return imageUri.toString();
365                } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
366                    logger.warning(() -> "Invalid CDROM image: " + image);
367                }
368                return image;
369            }
370        };
371
372    private final TemplateMethodModelEx adjustCloudInitMetaModel
373        = new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
374            @Override
375            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
376            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
377                    throws TemplateModelException {
378                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
379                var res = new HashMap<>((Map<String, Object>) DeepUnwrap
380                    .unwrap((TemplateModel) arguments.get(0)));
381                var metadata
382                    = (V1ObjectMeta) ((AdapterTemplateModel) arguments.get(1))
383                        .getAdaptedObject(Object.class);
384                if (!res.containsKey("instance-id")) {
385                    res.put("instance-id",
386                        Optional.ofNullable(metadata.getResourceVersion())
387                            .map(s -> "v" + s).orElse("v1"));
388                }
389                if (!res.containsKey("local-hostname")) {
390                    res.put("local-hostname", metadata.getName());
391                }
392                return res;
393            }
394        };
395
396    private final TemplateMethodModelEx toJsonModel
397        = new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
398            @Override
399            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
400            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
401                    throws TemplateModelException {
402                try {
403                    return mapper.writeValueAsString(
404                        ((AdapterTemplateModel) arguments.get(0))
405                            .getAdaptedObject(Object.class));
406                } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
407                    return "{}";
408                }
409            }
410        };
411}
